alert.note: Alert for Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OWEN COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Owenton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Owenton, Monterey, Gratz, Squiresville, Elk Lake, Beechwood, Harmony, Elmer Davis Lake, Long Ridge, Natlee and Gest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
